website_summaries.verdict: This ab stimulator has useful features to give you noticeable results when used routinely as part of your regular workout.
pros: Provides 10 different intensity levels and six exercise modes to fit different exercise goals
Recommended for use for only 12 minutes each session for results
cons: Gel pads occasionally fall of the skin
Instructions are confusing, but fortunately it's not too difficult to use

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is an Amazing good quality product , you can feel it on the texture. It is easy to use, I like that it comes with manual instructions easy to follow. I have used it once and I woke up feeling like I had done a major workout the night before. Strong sticks.No residue on the skin, and no pulling on the skin when you remove it, I felt the difference right away compare to other brand that I got before. It is worth it for the price. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Hello Abs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, as he wanted more definition in his abs. He has used it nightly and says he woke up feeling like he had done a major core workout the night before. It is easy to use, sticks on well after multiple uses. No residue on the skin, and no pulling on the skin when you remove it. Easy to follow instructions. Overall, great purchase, my son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: C7 Device Recycle

customer_reviews.title: This is junk
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like because I couldn't even use it 3 times just because it wouldn't stick on me because of the gel pads and then I bought 50 more gel pads and I can't get them to stick on me neither so just wasted my money on this
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Riley

customer_reviews.title: This ab stimulator works better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty skeptical about how well this might work but it was actually a surprise. This thin piece of material is stronger than it looks and does a really good job of stimulating the muscles. It is nice that it has several levels of stimulation. I used the strongest level in some areas and a little less in others. All in all, a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Trish at Play

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Imperfect
customer_reviews.text: One of the pads are broken only works on one side and it only goes on level 4 for some reason. The other pads work fine but they have a timer and then they shut off automatically. The pads arent sticky and fall off easily so forget about using it while on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Topher

customer_reviews.title: Stimulating the abs
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this abs stimulator. It easy to use, and the quality is excellent. The gel pads work great, and you can feel your abs stimulating. This product isn't a get "abs quick" type a product, you have to do some work yourself to help get the definition you are looking for, but I believe this abs stimulator will be great in getting you there. It's convenient and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: My3sons

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.  Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Felt my muscles working pretty quickly. Good packaging. Looking forward to using this in the long haul for results.
customer_reviews.author: SP1495

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this Abs Stimulator as directed ,15-20 minutes a day. I’ve noticed my stomach muscles coming back to life. It felt like I was down and did couple of hundred crunches. I love all the different modes, speeds, and intensities it offers. The controls are very straight forward and simple enough to use and the gel pads stick easily to the body. I also love the fact that this is rechargeable so I won’t worry about spending money on batteries. I highly recommend it for a quick abs workout. I think with the proper diet and using this abs stimulator 20 min daily, you should see real results.
customer_reviews.author: Emad Khreis

customer_reviews.title: So happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this Abs Stimulator. I already used it twice and I can feel my biceps and abs being activated. It provides plenty of adjustable power. Also, it is chargeable via USB cord which provides fast charging that lasts for a long time. It is perfect for a quick work out at home or in the office. I am very excited to see the results in the next weeks.
customer_reviews.author: sameh abdelmasih

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great product except for one of the clips was broken on each of the controllers. Still works, I just have to manually each of them on, which is a hassle. Other than that great. Note it will not work if you do not regularly excercise and eat well.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas44

customer_reviews.title: This really works!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I was able to feel it working my abs during and after use and saw results pretty shortly after. It also comes with instructions that make it very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Sundberg

customer_reviews.title: Similar to TENS
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful unit. Similar to a TENS unit. It pulses your ab muscles a And let me tell you. It works your abs pretty good in a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: James Nitz

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Very Good product, to see results you must make continuous and daily use, but it's comfortable and easy to use. It has several intensity levels to adjust it. I do love them sooo much ,I really highly Recommend. It's just like in the picture and it helps a lot
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed amree

customer_reviews.title: So efficient! Definitely Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this product! It was so easy to use , I wore it while I went hiking , the gym & even while doing chores around my house. It’s so efficient & you can literally feel it working while you have it on . Plus you have the option of setting it to different speeds , I always put mine on 4 . I definitely recommend this product for anyone who’s trying to tone up !
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: After about 5 uses... It doesn't work anymore. You can barely feel any pulse.
customer_reviews.author: Pam S.

customer_reviews.title: As promised
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised and as advertised. Very convenient to use. Looking forward to my six pack abs.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of spectacle of this but I bought and used it for about a week or so and I already see results!!
customer_reviews.author: Aphram boudagh

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying An Stimulator.
customer_reviews.text: Product was as ordered. Tried it on the hubby first and he was impressed. So far we are both enjoying our Ab stimulator.
customer_reviews.author: Flying Hawaiians

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It was pretty easy to use. I could actually feel my stomach and arm muscles tightening up as I used it. I can’t wait to see the results.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Packs a POWERFUL punch
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect this this to have this much power. Wow, level 4 is STRONG. Great item, wife loves it! Smaller than a computer mouse, but packs a powerful punch. Quality is better than I imagined.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was going to be really cheap..buts it’s pretty solid..Just got it...pretty cool so far. I don’t know if it’s helping me burn fat but it’s definitely doing something..I’ll follow up in a week..
customer_reviews.author: Vanna

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it's easy to use and comes with a manual. I love it. I will definitely order again
customer_reviews.author: Roussel

customer_reviews.title: I can feel my muscles working
customer_reviews.text: Really excited to use the stimulator. Seems the gel pads stick really well to the body. I can feel my muscles working!
customer_reviews.author: Oleg

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: After using this a few times, I can definitely feel a difference in my abdomen, the stimulators really do contract the muscles and I feel the same burn I'd feel after a workout in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: It works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use delivered the very next day I have had no issues at all with the product it's great! It REALLY DOES WORK YOUR ABS!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Cheap for being a fully rechargeable product. No batteries needed
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I use it before my workouts in the morning. I love the rechargeable feature, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Terrick Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The abs stimulator arrived on time and was packaged very nicely. It works exactly as described! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, affordable alternative
customer_reviews.text: Pretty efficient device, easy to use, and you can definitely feel it working when it's on. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sean Haynes

customer_reviews.title: This item has no stars.
customer_reviews.text: This item is not working properly, it has a defects.
customer_reviews.author: Frengellajohnson

customer_reviews.title: Impressed, works well, compact, and USB rechargeable.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to apply and use. I need something that helps improve my core. I can definitely feel my muscles working, and depending on the settings, I feel completely burned the next day. This is a great way to enhance my current exercise style. Now with COVID-19 closures, I am not able to exercise as much as I want. Pleased with the results so far! Well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Stimulating...you can feel it working!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I am older and not really keen on going to the gym as often, especially given the current situation {Covid 19} so I thought I'd give this ab stimulator a try. I use it mainly on my legs and abdomen and after these weeks of using it I can feel a firmness under a my little layers of flab. I think I could use it on my underarms and buttocks for that matter. Anyway, I'm very satisfied with my purchase although I would suggest you purchase some additional sticky pads. Recharges on USB, not batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Gussie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use this, however not all the pads work. Wish it worked properly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K.

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: This product its the best thing i’ve ever bought, it was so easy to use. I could feel in that there is progress over time using it, i would definitely recommend to anyone if you’re trying to get abs!
customer_reviews.author: alyod shmona

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, pain relief
customer_reviews.text: It’s so comfortable, pain relief, adjusting the levels where I felt comfortable,I like it
customer_reviews.author: Suhair hussien

customer_reviews.title: The efficiency of the materials
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the quality of the materials. I liked how the item that I purchased works efficiently. I would buy more things again and I would recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sandykoja

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy Muscle Stimulator!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded all expectations! I have to admit I was skeptical at first, but after a week of use, I already started to see results. As you can see, the product is well made and easy to use. You can really feel the abs contracting with consistent use; I felt like I did over 100 crunches. My girlfriend already noticed more definition in my abs after a week. A MUST BUY PRODUCT!!! I browsed the other ab and muscle stimulators available and this was the best in terms of performance and value!!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

product_meta.title: Y&S Styles Abs Stimulator for Men and Women- EMS Muscle Stimulator -Rechargeable Muscle Trainer- Abs Stimulating Belt – Abdominal Muscle Toning Belt-Arm and Leg Trainer, Home Gym Fitness Equipment
product_meta.description:
What's an EMS machine? 
EMS (Electrical Muscle Stimulation) through current stimulation, directly send signal to muscles, and promote muscle movement. All you have to do is to fit the pads to your body and let them exercise your muscles. Abdominal Fat Burner Rechargeable Electronic machine, Home/Office, Waist Trainer Trimmer/Arm/Leg with display screen. 

What ‘s EMS used for? 
1.Muscle strengthening. 
2.Rehabilitation purposes
3.preventing disuse Muscle atrophy
4.Increasing local blood circulation
5.Relaxation of muscles
6.Cosmetic muscle toning

Principle of EMS biological micro electric work: 
A. By electrical stimulation, the signal is transmitted directly to the muscles, causing muscle movement. 
B. It is a clinically recognized, effective, and non-pharmacological form of exercise, muscle movement. 
C. Use without side effects. 

Product Features: 
15-time intelligent frequency conversion, Level 15 exercise intensity
EMS intelligent biological micro stimulation allows muscles to break through the body limit
15 kinds of energy frequency conversion and high-intensity training, make 
exercise effect Better Exercise intensity increased by 50%.
3600-time muscle contraction rate
23 minutes is equivalent to running 3000 meters, pushups for an hour, swimming for 40 minutes
Mini is compact and easy to carry
The button fitting design, convenient disassembly, reduce space, convenient replacement of hydrogel patch. 

Why choose us? 
We are selling superior products and looking for original design and excellent services. Each product has been tested and improved for countless times. We hope to offer the best goods for you. And we provide securing services as well as lifetime technical support, 30 days free replacement or refund as desired.
feature_bullets: 💪🏻EMS Technology: muscle stimulator machine trains muscle cells. ems muscle stimulator helps to tighten and strengthen your muscles. ab muscle stimulator is small and portable, you could use it at anytime and anywhere, such as watching TV/ doing housework/ reading etc.

💪🏻Powerful & Efficient: This EMS (Electrical Muscle Stimulation) toner is designed for abdominal/arm/leg/hip/waist muscle training with 12-minute per time, which equals to 1500M running or 30 minutes swimming. This Ultimate ABS Stimulator provides 6 exercise modes and 10 intensity levels from warm-up to high-intensity exercise and finally to relaxation.

💪🏻Easy to use: Compare to traditional abs trainer, our product is small and lightweight, you could take it anywhere. This ab. stimulator can be used when doing housework, watching TV, reading a book or using a computer. This fat burner not leave any marks on your skin and it is reusable.

💪🏻Is it safe? The micro current using EMS technology directly affects the muscle fiber and strengthens and shapes it the best way without causing any damage to the body. Build-in Electrical Muscle Stimulator technology, relax your stiff muscle through the skin. Cover your your body of 98% fat accumulation.

💪🏻Customer satisfaction: Complete customer satisfaction is our top priority, so we work in close contact with our clients throughout the procedure. We are offering a ‘money back guarantee for customers that are not 100% satisfied. If for any reason you are not satisfied – just contact us and you will get a full refund!
